message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $2000000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $2000000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1400000 for the product. Can you consider this counteroffer?

I appreciate your interest in the product and your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I think the product is worth more than $1400000. I'm offering it to you for $1800000. What do you think?

I understand that you think the product is worth more, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1600000 for the product. Can you consider this counteroffer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I still think the product is worth more than $1600000. I'm offering it to you for $1700000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.

I understand that this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll meet you at $1650000 for the product. This is my last offer, and I hope you can consider it.

I'm surprised you're willing to go up to $1650000, Bob! However, I still think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering it to you for $1750000. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
